feature.p:
An INVALID_OPERATION error will no longer be raised by drawArrays or drawElements when blending is enabled and the draw buffer has 32-bit floating-point components. Note that in order to create such a draw buffer the
EXT_color_buffer_float or
WEBGL_color_buffer_float extensions must be enabled. This extension applies to both WebGL 1.0 and 2.0 contexts.

features.feature:
On supported systems, this extension is implicitly enabled when any of the following extensions are enabled:
EXT_color_buffer_float
OES_texture_float
WEBGL_color_buffer_float
This preserves functionality for content written before this extension was exposed.
